phrases: What should I name the way I am feeling right now?
The truth is, I already know what it is.
Come on, it is show time!
Are you going to be okay?
You are not nervous about your lines or anything?
I have memorized the important parts.
Looks like you are still a gorilla with a high-functioning brain.
How can she smile like that?
A few minutes ago, she would not get rid of her sulky face.
Ladies and gentlemen, thank you for your patience.
The next program will be a play performed by Class 1-C...
The story we are about to tell is a tragic love story.
Two families, locked in a deadly feud...
Born into these families, Romeo and Juliet,
in a cruel twist of fate, happen to fall in love!
O Romeo, why do our parents fight with such bitter hatred?
Normally, I am sure that like us, they could take each other by the hand, and love one another.
If they could only understand half of my love for you, Romeo-sama, I am sure...
All she did was look over the script a minute ago.
What was my next line, Romeo-sama?
I have to start off with such tedious lines!
How am I supposed to remember them?
Are they allowed to say that?
But it is funnier this way, you know!
This just might work out for them!
Give it all you have got!
You are the star of the show!
Young Master, you are a stud!
We are recording this, all right?
I told them not to come!
Now we cannot afford to screw this up at all!
I get that you are nervous, so let us take it from the top!
Come on, show me the money!
Juliet does not talk like that!
All righty, they are on a roll!
Romeo is about to sneak out of his mansion.
Not heeding the servant who tries to stop him,
he is trying to go see Juliet.
The Capulet family is out to kill you.
No matter how grave the danger, I still must go.
Even as we speak, she awaits me on that balcony.
However, it is at this moment that the servant makes a decision.
The truth is, this servant is in love with Romeo!
The servant, believing this to be the last time she will ever see Romeo alive,
makes up her mind to confess her love!
I never saw anything like that in the script!
The truth is, I have been... for a long time now, Romeo-sama, I have been in...
Contrary to her appearance, this servant appears to be quite bashful!
Where the hell is that tool?
While this is going on, Romeo sets off to meet Juliet!
Ladies and gentlemen, a big hand for our courageous servant!
Would not you know, a mysterious woman has burst onto the scene!
Just who could this woman be?
Out of the blue, Romeo is revealed to be a two-timer!
But I thought you had a cold!
If this is true, then it is a far cry from pure love!
Do not trash me for no reason!
You seem to have the wrong idea.
After what you did to me!
When you told me you would marry me, was that a lie?
So these two have taken their relationship even farther than we thought!
How are you going to take responsibility for this, Romeo?
Damn it, he is adding subplots left and right!
I wonder what she means by that?
There you go again, putting me on the spot like you always do.
You know that is not possible.
After all, you and I are brother and sister!
It is one shocking revelation after another!
But if it is true, these two cannot possibly get married!
But when it comes to love, such things do not matter!
Let us get married, my dearest brother, Romeo!
Despite it all, Josephine is unstoppable!
What the hell are they doing?
The younger sister who so sweetly cares for her elder brother...
What on Earth is Romeo going to do?
The road I will be traveling is a blood-soaked trail involving both families.
I do not want to get my fragile little sister involved in such an ordeal!
Romeo-sama, you would be so concerned about my health?
This is where the fragile Josephine makes her exit!
And so Romeo has fended off an unexpected assassin!
I will come visit you later, okay?
Romeo is now on his way to see Juliet!
I cannot allow you to see Juliet.
What the hell are you doing?!
Rumor has it that you are a piece of scum
who thinks nothing of breaking women's hearts while two-timing or even three-timing them.
I will not hand over my sister to such a man!
If you think you are going to see her...
You will have to defeat me first!
Now here is yet another sudden twist in the tale!
Will Romeo find a way to make it safely to Juliet?
What do you think you are doing?
You stay out of this, Juliet.
If only this man did not exist...
I could have you by my side forever!
It appears that Big Bro has a hardcore little sister complex!
You are totally helpless, are not you?
You are the only one who is armed!
I am not going to just lay down and die, damn you!
Thanks to their furious battle, the castle walls have collapsed!
They are both buried under the rubble!
The winner of this duel is Romeo!
Seriously, he is such an idiot.
No, no, I am the idiot.
All this time, I have just been too afraid to admit it.
It is about time that I did.
O Romeo, wherefore art thou Romeo?
If only you were not Romeo, the son of the Montagues,
nothing and nobody would get in the way of our love.
Romeo, doff thy name, and for that name which is no part of thee, take all myself.
I take thee at thy word.
Call me but love, and I will be new baptized.
Henceforth I never will be Romeo.
The fact that I am in love with him.
There you go again with your cliches!
I wanted to try it, just once.
It is like pretending to be one of those girly girls.
Making it obvious does not score extra points.
Did not you see the audience's reaction?
I got to give you props for pulling off something like that without even rehearsing.
You even had most of your lines down.
If you only knew how hard I had it learning my own.
It is kind of similar, do not you think?
The play... and our own story.
Our families feuding with each other...
Well, the biggest difference is that we are not really in love.
If that part's not the same, then they are totally different stories.
True, you are right about that.
for how I have been lately.
for my nasty attitude and all.
and slapping you across the face.
I will go back to normal now.
Back to the way I was before...
I will go back to being my usual self,
When we were polar opposites in every way,
the fake couple that hated each other.
I will go back to being that person.
I do not see a problem with it.
If we are a fake couple that hates each other, then it is only natural that we would fight.
But you just told me that you did not hate me by a long shot.
You are the one who just brought up hating each other.
Then, were you lying to me?
Listen, do you want me to hate you or not?
and I have not seen much of the Culture Festival yet.
If you are going to twist my arm, then I will keep you company.
What is it going to be?
Where the hell did that smile come from?
She is so cheerful now, you cannot tell she was sulking before the play.
Why did she do a total 180 on her attitude?
I do not hate you, not by a long shot.
Does this mean she is been so pissed at me all this time because she thought I hated her?
Man, that was a roaring success!
I heard that everyone was raving about our class!
Pass the juice around to everybody!
We have got lots of snacks, too!
There is our leading lady, Kirisaki-san!
You did that pretty much on the fly, did not you?
How did you learn your lines?
I have to say, I was even a little moved!
Well, for a moment there I was not sure how it was going to end up,
but we got to hand it to our famous couple!
They really brought their A-game, did not they?
So did you two make up?
But hey, you sure gave us a shock!
The way she slapped you last week,
the whole class was like, Are they history?
I did you a solid and told everyone that you would realized you were a masochist!
How the hell did you come up with that vicious excuse?
By the way, how is Marika-chan?
I just stopped by to see her.
Talk about pushing yourself too hard.
On the day of the play?
Sorry, I did not get to play Juliet.
I will go get you one.
You weasel, where do you get off making that narration?
That was just me spicing things up!
I will spice you up, you bastard!
Sorry, but would you mind giving this to Kosaki?
I do not mind, but why?
You will shoot a hole in me!
I am going to get busy scarfing down noodles right now.
Here, Miyamoto wanted me to give you this.
So you two made up, huh?
If you had not talked Chitoge-chan into it,
I just know that I would have regretted what happened today forever.
None of that was your fault, Onodera.
The one who wanted to play Juliet more than anyone else,
was none other than you, right?
Yes, well, that is true, but...
Did you feel that strongly about it?
It was a totally personal reason,
but the truth is, I think I wanted to play her no matter what.
Because I had a feeling that it was going to be a really special memory for me.
Listen, if you really want to...
There is nobody around here, so I thought we could just have at it.
I am still a little embarrassed, though.
Wow, this is still pretty nerve-wracking!
I am embarrassed too, you know!
I despise everything that keeps us apart.
Why would the gods put us through such an ordeal as this?
O Romeo, why do our parents fight with such bitter hatred?
Normally, I am sure that like us, they could take each other by the hand, and love one another.
If they could only understand half of my love for you, Romeo-sama...
Alas, Juliet, it is time to say goodbye.
It is time to say goodbye.
Tomorrow at sunset, I will come see you at that balcony again.
Will you promise to wait for me there again?
Sunset, just as the fallen leaves start blowing in the wind.
It is our first, unforgettable high school Culture Festival,
and the curtain has rung down.
Seishirou-chan, you cannot fire that indoors!
fukinuketa kaze ha erimoto wo toori
The wind that blew past my collar
mada dare mo shiranai haru wo yobikomu
Ushers in the spring, though nobody is aware
The moment our eyes met we made each other laugh
houkago nandomo (kimi no) tonari de sugoshita
After school, I often passed the time (with you) by your side
When I heard that voice drifting high into the sky
I felt uneasy about the distant future
katakoto datte taido de wakaru noni
may be incomprehensible but even though
I get a sense of it from the tone
I want to see it all, all of it,
Is no need to hold on to all my memories,
i am about to no watashi motto motto soba de
Wants to be by your side more and more, so listen
